## CustomHttpResponseOptions interface

HTTP response parameters for a response with adjustable status code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomHttpResponseOptions<T extends HttpResponsePayload | ResponseError> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [body](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.customhttpresponseoptions.body.md) | <code>T</code> | HTTP message to send to the client |
|  [headers](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.customhttpresponseoptions.headers.md) | <code>ResponseHeaders</code> | HTTP Headers with additional information about response |
|  [statusCode](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.customhttpresponseoptions.statuscode.md) | <code>number</code> |  |
